row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@WINDOWS
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
Set-Location &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_VPC_OPTION# = '' :IF &UC4RB_AWS_VPC_ID# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_VPC_OPTION# = '-c &UC4RB_AWS_VPC_ID#' :ENDIF
Write-Host "`nCreating security group.."
$output = java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute $env:EC2_HOME\bin\ec2-create-group.cmd &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# "&UC4RB_AWS_SECURITY_GRP#" -d "&UC4RB_AWS_DESCRIPTION#" &UC4RB_VPC_OPTION#
$result = $output | select-string -pattern ^GROUP -caseSensitive
if (![bool]($result)) { Write-Host "Failed to create security group" $error = [string]::join("`n", $output) Write-Host $error exit 1 }
Write-Host $result
$split = $result.tostring().split("`t") $group_id = $split[1]
Write-Host "Successfully create group $group_id`n"
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_VPC_ID# <> "" : IF &UC4RB_AWS_ALLOW_ALL_OUT# = "NO" Write-Host "Revoking default outbound rule from group $group_id.." ! revoke outbound rule $output = java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute $env:EC2_HOME\bin\ec2-revoke.cmd &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# $group_id --egress -P all $result = $output | select-string -pattern ^PERMISSION -caseSensitive if (![bool]($result)) { Write-Host "Failed to revoke default outbound rule" $error = [string]::join("`n", $output) Write-Host $error exit 1 } Write-Host $result Write-Host "Successfully revoke default outbound rule" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS

row.post_process: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "GROUP*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &tab# = STR_CUT(&output_line#, 6, 1) : SET &output_line# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, 7) : SET &output_line# = STR_SUB(&output_line#, &tab#, " ") : DEFINE &results#, string, 3 : FILL &results#[] = STR_SPLIT(&output_line#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_OUT_SECURITY_GRP# = &results#[1] : PRINT Group ID = &UC4RB_OUT_SECURITY_GRP# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_SECURITY_GRP#, , "WORKFLOW" : TERM_PROCESS :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
